mapper.select: SELECT v.id, v.video_url, c.camera_name, c.lat, c.lon, d.detected_object_id, o.uuid, e.code_name, o.crop_img FROM video v INNER JOIN public.detection d on v.id = d.video_id INNER JOIN public.camera_info c on c.camera_id = v.camera_id INNER JOIN public.detected_object o on o.id = d.detected_object_id INNER JOIN public.event_codes e on e.code_id = o.code_id WHERE v.id = #{id}

SELECT v.video_url, o.uuid, o.alias, o.crop_img, d.appeared_time, d.exit_time, e.code_name FROM video v INNER JOIN public.detection d on v.id = d.video_id INNER JOIN public.detected_object o on o.id = d.detected_object_id INNER JOIN public.event_codes e on e.code_id = o.code_id WHERE d.id = #{mobileDetectionId} LIMIT 1

SELECT v.video_url, ei.event_uuid, ei.start_frame_at, ei.end_frame_at, ec.code_name, er.risk_level FROM video v INNER JOIN public.event_info ei on v.event_id = ei.event_id INNER JOIN public.event_codes ec on ei.code_id = ec.code_id INNER JOIN public.event_risks er on ec.risk_id = er.risk_id WHERE ei.event_id = #{eventId} LIMIT 1
